function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of surfacewise 2 in liquid form using astm e1052 standard test method.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in workplace settings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage and availability","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of sars-cov and mers-cov studies","category":"Nature","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Discrepancies in extracted data","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of publication bias leading to inaccurate assessment of intervention effectiveness","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Potential risk of low-quality studies influencing meta-analysis results","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Variability in study design and settings may affect generalizability of results and recommendations.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of participants in some studies may result in skewed or unreliable findings.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies conducted before covid-19 vaccinations were available may limit the applicability of findings to the current environment.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete reporting of intervention follow-up time in longitudinal studies","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low quality score of some studies, including cross-sectional studies","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of assessment on the effectiveness of environmental adjustments in workplace covid-19 ipc measures","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of systematic testing and monitoring","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate use of ppe and hygiene practices","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of contact tracing and quarantine measures","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in ppe use and efficacy testing","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of surveillance measures","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in effectiveness of ppe and masking policies may lead to inconsistent protection against covid-19 transmission in workplace settings.","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of n95 respirators compared to surgical masks in hospital
